messages.message: Unexpected any. Specify a different type.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

messages.message: Fast refresh only works when a file only exports components. Use a new file to share constants or functions between components.

messages.message: React Hook useEffect has a missing dependency: 'fetchEvents'. Either include it or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [fetchEvents, user]

messages.message: React Hook useEffect has missing dependencies: 'fetchProfile' and 'fetchRegistrations'. Either include them or remove the dependency array.

suggestions.desc: Update the dependencies array to be: [fetchProfile, fetchRegistrations, user]
